市長選挙: (しちょうせんきょ) - mayoral election
市電: (しでん) - municipal railway; city streetcar; tram
布: (fu/nuno) - linen , cloth; bujian (spade-shaped bronze coin of ancient China)
布おむつ: (ぬのおむつ) - cloth diaper; cloth nappy
布く: (しく) - to spread out/to lay out; to take a position; to impose widely (e.g. over a city)
布オムツ: (ぬのオムツ) - cloth diaper; cloth nappy
布団: (futon) - futón; almofada redonda usada para meditação Zen (tradicionalmente feita de folhas de junco trançadas)
布団かご: (ふとんかご) - gabion; cage filled with stones
布団を敷く: (ふとんをしく) - to lay out a futon; to make a bed
布団干し: (ふとんほし) - drying a futon (by hanging it outside in the sun)
布団篭: (ふとんかご) - gabion; cage filled with stones
布団蒸: (ふとんむし) - burying a person under a futon
布団蒸し: (ふとんむし) - burying a person under a futon
布幅いっぱい: (ぬのはばいっぱい) - cloth width excess
布教: (ふきょう) - propagation (e.g. a religion); proselytizing; missionary work
布教者: (ふきょうしゃ) - missionary; evangelist; propagandist
布目: (ぬのめ) - texture; "grain" of a fabric or cloth; direction of the loom or weave in a roll of fabric
布石: (ふせき) - strategic arrangement of go stones/opening moves; preparation/preparatory steps/groundwork
布衣: (ほうい) - linen kariginu; (during the Edo period) plain kariginu
布衣始: (ほういはじめ) - ceremony in which an abdicated emperor puts on informal court clothes (e.g. kariginu, eboshi)
布衣始め: (ほういはじめ) - ceremony in which an abdicated emperor puts on informal court clothes (e.g. kariginu, eboshi)
布袋: (ほてい) - pot-bellied god of good fortune
布袋葵: (ほていあおい) - Eichornia crassipes; water hyacinth
布袋蘭: (ホテイラン) - fairy slipper (Calypso bulbosa, esp. Calypso bulbosa var. speciosa)
布設: (ふせつ) - laying (a railroad, pipes, naval mines, etc.); construction
布銭: (ふせん) - bujian (spade-shaped bronze coin of ancient China)
帆をかける: (ほをかける) - to raise a sail
帆を掛ける: (ほをかける) - to raise a sail
帆立: (ホタテ) - Japanese scallop (Patinopecten yessoensis); Yesso scallop
帆脚: (ほあし) - rope that ties the lower end of the sail to the hull (on a Japanese-style ship)
帆船: (hansen) - navio à vela, barco à vela, embarcação à vela
帆足: (ほあし) - rope that ties the lower end of the sail to the hull (on a Japanese-style ship)
希う: (こいねがう) - to beg; to request; to beseech; to implore; to entreat
希わくは: (こいねがわくは) - I pray in earnest that; I beg that; I yearn that
希わくば: (ねがわくば) - I pray; I wish
希ガス: (きガス) - noble gas/inert gas; (希ガス only)  (joc)  I get the feeling that/I think that
希ガス類: (きガスるい) - noble gases; rare gases
希土類元素: (きどるいげんそ) - rare earth elements
希少価値: (きしょうかち) - (yoji) scarcity value; rarity value; preciousness
希望に沿う: (きぼうにそう) - to meet someone's requirements; to meet expectations; to go along with what somebody wants
希望の光: (きぼうのひかり) - ray of hope; glimmer of hope
希望の星: (きぼうのほし) - ray of light; ray of hope; promising talent
